Item.name: Energy Drink
Item.description: A bottle of a soda called Corn-a-Cola...

Item.name: Beer
Item.description: A bottle of local beer. Don't let security find you with this.

Item.name: Red Wine
Item.description: A priced bottle of red wine. This probably came all the way from earth.

Item.name: Vodka
Item.description: A bottle of a strong distilled beverage. This probably came all the way from earth.

Item.name: Flour
Item.description: Wheat flour. A decent cook can do wonders with this.

Item.name: Sugar
Item.description: A crystalline substance, typically sweet-tasting carbohydrates and exemplified by glucose and sucrose.

Item.name: Salt
Item.description: Salt is a strong-tasting substance, in the form of white powder that consists of sodium chloride.

Item.name: Chips
Item.description: A bag containing thin slices of deep fried potatoes commonly served as a snack.

Item.name: Chocolate
Item.description: A delicious bar of real chocolate. Product imported from Earth.

Item.name: Protein Bar
Item.description: A synthetic mixture of carbohydrates, vitamins, amino acids and minerals. Everything the body needs in a jelly block. It tastes like synthetic crap, though.

Item.name: Bread
Item.description: One of humanity's staple food in Earth. It's not as common here in Europa.

Item.name: Apple
Item.description: An Earth fruit probably grown in hydroponic farms.

Item.name: Cotton Candy
Item.description: A treat associated with carnivals, fairs and clowns.

Item.name: Candy Apple
Item.description: A treat associated with carnivals, fairs and clowns.

Item.name: Carrot
Item.description: An Earth vegetable probably grown in hydroponic farms.

Item.name: Potato
Item.description: An Earth vegetable probably grown in hydroponic farms.

Item.name: Baked Potato
Item.description: Usually cooked by someone either really hungry or with no actual cooking skills.

Item.name: Fries
Item.description: Crispy and delicious deep-fried potatoes. Usually part of a dish or eaten as a snack by themselves.

Item.name: Human Meat
Item.description: A chunk of raw human meat. Only the strong survive.

Item.name: Crew Steak
Item.description: A steak out of someone you worked with.

Item.name: Thresher Meat
Item.description: A chunk of raw tiger thresher meat. It's best not to eat it raw.

Item.name: Seared Thresher
Item.description: Seared tiger thresher. A simple meal to make but delicious.

Item.name: Fried Thresher
Item.description: Battered and fried tiger thresher. Usually paired with fries for a superb meal.

Item.name: Glazed Thresher
Item.description: A baked loaf of caramelized tiger thresher meat. Red wine glazed meals are no ordinary rations.

Item.name: Snailfish Meat
Item.description: A chunk of raw snailfish meat. It's mildly toxic unless properly cooked.

Item.name: Seared Snailfish
Item.description: Seared Snailfish. Delicious!

Item.name: Crawler Meat
Item.description: A chunk of raw crawler meat. It stinks like this so better find an oven.

Item.name: Seared Crawler
Item.description: Seared Crawler. Delicious!

Item.name: Mantis Meat
Item.description: A chunk of raw mantis meat. It stinks like this so better find an oven.

Item.name: Seared Mantis
Item.description: Seared Mantis. It tastes like shrimp!

Item.name: Fried Mantis
Item.description: Battered and fried Mantis pieces. It tastes like shrimp!

Item.name: Mantis Eggs
Item.description: Mantis eggs are considered a delicacy often enjoyed only by the wealthy.

Item.name: Mantis Caviar
Item.description: Salt-cured Mantis eggs. A delicacy, if properly prepared.

Item.name: Apple Pie
Item.description: Good food like this is hard to come by around these parts.

Item.name: Carrot Pie
Item.description: Good food like this is hard to come by around these parts.

Item.name: Crawler Pie
Item.description: Good food like this is hard to come by around these parts.

Item.name: Thresher Pie
Item.description: Good food like this is hard to come by around these parts.

Item.name: Mantcrawl Cocktail
Item.description: Good food like this is hard to come by around these parts.

Item.name: Seabed Soup
Item.description: Also called Slop. This is usually feed to prisoners or eaten by a very desperate crew.

Item.name: Thresher Stew
Item.description: Good food like this is hard to come by around these parts.

Item.name: Velonaceps Calyx Eggs
Item.description: Dormant eggs of the Europan lifeform colloquially referred to as 'husk parasite'.

Item.name: Husk Caviar
Item.description: Salt-cured eggs of the Velonaceps Calyx parasite. A delicacy, if properly prepared.

Item.name: Mantcrawl CocktaiI
Item.description: Good food like this is hard to come by around these parts.

Item.name: Husk Cаviаг
Item.description: Salt-cured eggs of the Velonaceps Calyx parasite. A delicacy, if properly prepared.
